summary: The document is a memorandum from 10 December 1970, detailing the request for the activation of a TOP SECRET clearance for Mr. David L. Christ, a recent retiree from the Agency now employed by Devenco in New York City. This clearance is necessary for his participation in Agency-sponsored work with Devenco, with which ORD has a contractual relationship. Additionally, the memo notes the requirement for Mr. Christ to obtain special clearances (SI & TK) for his new role, with a separate request to be submitted following the activation of his TOP SECRET clearance.
key_findings: Mr. David L. Christ retired from the Agency in November 1970 and is now employed by Devenco of New York City.
ORD has a contractual relationship with Devenco and requires Mr. Christ's TOP SECRET clearance to be activated for Agency-sponsored work.
Mr. Christ held several special clearances while in ORD and will require SI & TK clearances in his current role.
A request is made for Mr. Christ to be processed for an Industrial Security Approval at the TOP SECRET level.
